verses.verse: To the chief <S%H5329><s%> Musician, <S%H5329><s%> A Psalm <S%H4210><s%> for the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Korah. <S%H7141><s%> Hear <S%H8085><s%> this, <S%H2063><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> you people; <S%H5971><s%> give ear, <S%H238><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> you inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of the world: <S%H2465><s%>
Both <S%H1571><s%> low <S%H120><s%> and high, <S%H376><s%> rich <S%H6223><s%> and poor, <S%H34><s%> together. <S%H3162><s%>
My mouth <S%H6310><s%> shall speak <S%H1696><s%> of wisdom; <S%H2454><s%> and the meditation <S%H1900><s%> of my heart <S%H3820><s%> shall be of understanding. <S%H8394><s%>
I will incline <S%H5186><s%> my ear <S%H241><s%> to a parable: <S%H4912><s%> I will open <S%H6605><s%> my dark <S%H2420><s%> saying <S%H2420><s%> on the harp. <S%H3658><s%>
Why <S%H4100><s%> should I fear <S%H3372><s%> in the days <S%H3117><s%> of evil, <S%H7451><s%> when the iniquity <S%H5771><s%> of my heels <S%H6120><s%> shall compass <S%H5437><s%> me about?
They that trust <S%H982><s%> in their wealth, <S%H2428><s%> and boast <S%H1984><s%> themselves in the multitude <S%H7230><s%> of their riches; <S%H6239><s%>
None <S%H376><s%> <S%H3808><s%> of them can by any means redeem <S%H6299><s%> his brother, <S%H251><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> give <S%H5414><s%> to God <S%H430><s%> a ransom <S%H3724><s%> for him:
(For the redemption <S%H6306><s%> of their soul <S%H5315><s%> is precious, <S%H3365><s%> and it ceases <S%H2308><s%> for ever: <S%H5769><s%>)
That he should still <S%H5750><s%> live <S%H2421><s%> for ever, <S%H5331><s%> and not see <S%H7200><s%> corruption. <S%H7845><s%>

For he sees <S%H7200><s%> that wise <S%H2450><s%> men die, <S%H4191><s%> likewise the fool <S%H3684><s%> and the brutish <S%H1197><s%> person perish, <S%H6><s%> and leave <S%H5800><s%> their wealth <S%H2428><s%> to others. <S%H312><s%>

Their inward <S%H7130><s%> thought is, that their houses <S%H1004><s%> shall continue for ever, <S%H5769><s%> and their dwelling <S%H4908><s%> places to all generations; <S%H1755><s%> they call <S%H7121><s%> their lands <S%H127><s%> after their own names. <S%H8034><s%>
Nevertheless man <S%H120><s%> being in honor <S%H3366><s%> stays <S%H3885><s%> not: he is like <S%H4911><s%> the beasts <S%H929><s%> that perish. <S%H1820><s%>
This <S%H2088><s%> their way <S%H1870><s%> is their folly: <S%H3689><s%> yet their posterity <S%H310><s%> approve <S%H7521><s%> their sayings. <S%H6310><s%> Selah. <S%H5542><s%>

Like sheep <S%H6629><s%> they are laid <S%H8371><s%> in the grave; <S%H7585><s%> death <S%H4194><s%> shall feed <S%H7462><s%> on them; and the upright <S%H3477><s%> shall have dominion <S%H7287><s%> over them in the morning; <S%H1242><s%> and their beauty <S%H6736><s%> shall consume <S%H1086><s%> in the grave <S%H7585><s%> from their dwelling. <S%H2073><s%>
But God <S%H430><s%> will redeem <S%H6299><s%> my soul <S%H5315><s%> from the power <S%H3027><s%> of the grave: <S%H7585><s%> for he shall receive <S%H3947><s%> me. Selah. <S%H5542><s%>
Be not you afraid <S%H3372><s%> when <S%H3588><s%> one <S%H376><s%> is made rich, <S%H6238><s%> when <S%H3588><s%> the glory <S%H3519><s%> of his house <S%H1004><s%> is increased; <S%H7235><s%>
For when <S%H3588><s%> he dies <S%H4194><s%> he shall carry <S%H3947><s%> nothing <S%H3808><s%> <S%H3605><s%> away: his glory <S%H3519><s%> shall not descend <S%H3381><s%> after <S%H310><s%> him.
Though <S%H3588><s%> while he lived <S%H2416><s%> he blessed <S%H1288><s%> his soul: <S%H5315><s%> and men will praise <S%H3034><s%> you, when <S%H3588><s%> you do well <S%H3190><s%> to yourself.
He shall go <S%H935><s%> to the generation <S%H1755><s%> of his fathers; <S%H1><s%> they shall never <S%H5704><s%> see <S%H7200><s%> light. <S%H216><s%>
Man <S%H120><s%> that is in honor, <S%H3366><s%> and understands <S%H995><s%> not, is like <S%H4911><s%> the beasts <S%H929><s%> that perish. <S%H1820><s%>
